entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 29 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h before morning. Temperature rising to minus 29 by morning. Wind chill near minus 44. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 27 with temperature falling to minus 32 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near noon then clearing. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 27 with temperature falling to minus 32 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 42 in the morning and minus 37 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023
